T02TD3051E:99a-0: @99a [line missing] [line missing] [line missing] [line missing] [line missing] [line missing] @99b [page missing] @100a * //
T02TD3051E:99a-3: h'um bcom ldan rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba ni //
T02TD3051E:99a-4: rig sngags bdag po phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3051E:99a-5: snying rje'i yid kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal //
T02TD3051E:99a-6: de nas byin brlabs gnang ba mdzad par gsol //
T02TD3051E:99a-7: dgongs shig sangs rgyas sde dang tshogs ;
T02TD3051E:99a-8: / lha rnams bstan la mngon dga' ba //
T02TD3051E:99a-9: dkyil 'khor byin brlab dngos grub mdzod //
T02TD3051E:99a-12: de nas gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa'am /
T02TD3051E:99a-13: yang na gnyis la sna tshogs padma'i steng du rang gi mtshan nyid bri /
T02TD3051E:99a-14: las kyi bum pa la padma'i dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje bri bar bya'o //
T02TD3051E:99a-15: gtso bo'i bum par sman lnga /
T02TD3051E:99a-18: dri chu bdud rtsi lngas bkang la /
T02TD3051E:99a-19: bum pa gzhan du 'ang de bzhin te /
T02TD3051E:99a-20: mgul chings ras zung gcig gis bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD3051E:99a-21: me tog phreng ba dang gdugs kyis brgyan te /
T02TD3051E:99a-22: gdugs dkar po re re dbub par bya'o //
T02TD3051E:99a-23: tsu ta la sogs te 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing gis kha brgyan par bya'o //
T02TD3051E:99a-24: de nas gtso bo'i bum par padma'i sku bskyed /
T02TD3051E:99a-25: phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par byas la /
T02TD3051E:99a-26: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs bstims la /
T02TD3051E:99a-27: mchod bstod dang bzlas pa bya /
T02TD3051E:99a-28: dam tshig gi khro bo dang /
T02TD3051E:99a-29: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi gnyis 'dres pas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD3051E:99a-30: de nas bum pa gzhan du yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD3051E:99a-31: las kyi bum pa la padma'i steng du las thams cad pa'i khro bo bskyed la /
T02TD3051E:99a-32: ye shes bcug la mchod pa dang bzlas ba byas nas /
T02TD3051E:99a-33: ma zhu bar skur bzhugs par bsgoms nas ma grub bar du bgegs ma rungs pa bsrung bar gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD3051E:99a-34: bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD3051E:99a-35: de nas slob ma shar phyogs su mandal phul la der 'dug la /
T02TD3051E:99a-36: rdo rje slob dpon gyis gtso bo'i nga rgyal byas la gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD3051E:99a-37: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02TD3051E:99a-38: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD3051E:99a-39: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD3051E:99a-40: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3051E:99a-41: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02TD3051E:99a-42: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD3051E:99a-43: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te /
T02TD3051E:100b-0: skyabs @100b gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD3051E:100b-1: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD3051E:100b-4: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i lag pa nas bzung nas /
T02TD3051E:100b-5: bu tshur theg pa chen po la //
T02TD3051E:100b-6: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te //
T02TD3051E:100b-7: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //
T02TD3051E:100b-8: khyod la yang dag bstan par bgyi //
T02TD3051E:100b-9: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02TD3051E:100b-10: gang dag de bzhin ma byon dang //
T02TD3051E:100b-11: da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD3051E:100b-12: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams //
T02TD3051E:100b-13: de dag kun gyi sa gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD3051E:100b-14: tshogs mchog bzang po 'di mkhyen nas //
T02TD3051E:100b-15: dpa' bos byang chub shing drug du //
T02TD3051E:100b-16: thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med brnyes //
T02TD3051E:100b-17: gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med pa //
T02TD3051E:100b-18: skyob pa rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba yis //
T02TD3051E:100b-19: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
T02TD3051E:100b-20: dpung chen dag kyang 'di yis bcom //
T02TD3051E:100b-21: de nas kun mkhyen thob pa'i phyir //
T02TD3051E:100b-22: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / de nas nyan par rna ba gtod pa dang /
T02TD3051E:100b-23: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du bcug ste /
T02TD3051E:100b-24: de nas bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa dang thun mong gi sngom pa dang /
T02TD3051E:100b-25: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i phas pham pa bcu bzhi dang /
T02TD3051E:100b-26: sdom pa dbog pa la sogs pa dag kyang bya'o //
T02TD3051E:100b-27: de nas slob ma'i gnas gsum du dri'i thig le byas te /
T02TD3051E:100b-28: rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma dag bskyed de /
T02TD3051E:100b-29: de dag gi lte bar sa bon gsum bsam zhing /
T02TD3051E:100b-30: aom a'a: h'um zhes gnas gsum du rdo rje gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD3051E:100b-31: de nas mchod de so shing me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02TD3051E:100b-32: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis btab la sbyin no //
T02TD3051E:100b-33: slob mas rtse 'cha' zhing rtsa ba brud la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dor ro //
T02TD3051E:100b-34: zhi ba la sogs te las dang dngos grub kyi rtags shes par bya'o //
T02TD3051E:100b-35: srung skud la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i mdud pa bor te /
T02TD3051E:100b-36: dpung pa g-yon pa la gdags par bya'o //
T02TD3051E:100b-37: de nas ku sha la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis byin la /
T02TD3051E:100b-38: shar lho mtshams su mgo bstan la nyal te rmi lam dran par bya'o //
T02TD3051E:100b-39: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD3051E:100b-40: de nas yol ba'i nang du log la mchod bstod dang bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD3051E:101a-0: de nas nang par dkyil 'khor gyi lha nam mkhar bteg la thig gdab par bya'o @101a * //
T02TD3051E:101a-1: tshon sna lnga'i skud pa so sor stong pa nyid las yi ge ldar gyur par bsam /
T02TD3051E:101a-2: de nas de dag gcig tu bsgril la /
T02TD3051E:101a-3: gser la sogs pa'i snod du bzhag la bdud rtsi lnga'am /
T02TD3051E:101a-4: spos chus bsangs te g-yas g-yon dbus dang gsum du aom a'a: h'um gis rim par bkod de bzhag /
T02TD3051E:101a-5: de ni dam tshig gi skud pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD3051E:101a-6: de nas ma dun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i rigs lnga'i thugs ka nas ye shes kyi skud pa 'od du gnas par bsams te /
T02TD3051E:101a-7: rang gi mig gnyis su nyi ma bsams te /
T02TD3051E:101a-8: de'i steng du dza: dmar po bsam /
T02TD3051E:101a-9: de nas mig gi rdzim 'dren pas /
T02TD3051E:101a-10: ye shes kyi skud pa dza: sa drangs nas dam tshig gi skud pa la gzhug go //
T02TD3051E:101a-11: de nas mchod pa lngas mchod do //
T02TD3051E:101a-12: ye shes kyi skud pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD3051E:101a-13: de nas slob dpon nub tu 'dug nas /
T02TD3051E:101a-14: skud pa rdo rje'i khu tshur g-yon pas bzung la /
T02TD3051E:101a-16: lte bar khu tshur bzhag la dza: gsum gyis slob ma'i lag tu g-yas pas drangs te byin la /
T02TD3051E:101a-17: tshangs pa'i thig dang po gdab bo //
T02TD3051E:101a-18: aom badzra sa ma ya m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02TD3051E:101a-19: zhes gyen du btab pa'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'gro ba'i don gyi dus la bab po bar bskul lo //
T02TD3051E:101a-20: de nas tshangs thig gnyis pa yang de bzhin du gdab par bya'o //
T02TD3051E:101a-21: de nas kha dog gcig pa'i skud pa las thams cad pas byin gyis brlabs la sa'i thig btab la /
T02TD3051E:101a-22: de'i steng du ye shes kyi thig btab la snga ma'i thig byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD3051E:101a-23: de nas ye shes kyi thig la mchod pa byas la slar gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD3051E:101a-24: de nas tshangs pa'i thig dang po btab la bya rog rjes gnyis lho byang du bri'o //
T02TD3051E:101a-25: de nas gnyis pa btab ste /
T02TD3051E:101a-26: des zur bzhi'i bya rjes btsal lo //
T02TD3051E:101a-31: de nas me rlung gi gru gdab /
T02TD3051E:101a-32: srin po dang dbang ldan gdab /
T02TD3051E:101a-33: de nas cha chen nyi shur btab na bde ba yin /
T02TD3051E:101a-34: de la dbus kyi pho brang dang sgo rta babs dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD3051E:101a-35: rdo rje rab me ri gnyis bco brgyad ma gtogs phyi nas btsal ba thig gi rim pa'o //
T02TD3051E:101a-36: de nas tshon sna lnga'i rim par bzhag ste /
T02TD3051E:101a-37: stong pa nyid las yi ge lnga las bskyed de /
T02TD3051E:101a-38: dri dang bdud rtsis bsangs la /
T02TD3051E:101b-0: de nas snga ma bzhin du ye shes tshon 'bar @101b ba'i lta bas snga ma bzhin du bkug la bstim la /
T02TD3051E:101b-1: aom badzra tsi tras ma ya stvam zhes bzlas /
T02TD3051E:101b-2: de nas byang shar mtshams nas dkar po drangs te /
T02TD3051E:101b-3: mdzub gang bla ma'i lag pa g-yon pas bri'o //
T02TD3051E:101b-5: chos dbyings 'di ni dag pa ste //
T02TD3051E:101b-6: sems can khams kun sgrol byed pa //
T02TD3051E:101b-7: rgyal ba rdo rje ga nam lcags mchu 'bar nyid //
T02TD3051E:101b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD3051E:101b-10: des mchod la rin po che'i snod kyis bkab la gzhag go //
T02TD3051E:101b-11: de nas dbus nas bri bar bya ste /
T02TD3051E:101b-12: rdo rje rtse lnga rgya gram rdo rje ra bar ldan pa /
T02TD3051E:101b-13: de ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor yin //
T02TD3051E:101b-14: de nas phyi yi zlum po ni //
T02TD3051E:101b-15: 'khor lo rtsibs bcu'i lte ba bya //
T02TD3051E:101b-16: de yi phyi rim rdo rje'i rab bya //
T02TD3051E:101b-17: gru chad snam bu bzhi dang ldan //
T02TD3051E:101b-18: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD3051E:101b-19: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD3051E:101b-20: dril bu dang ni 'phan la sogs //
T02TD3051E:101b-21: me tog phreng ba rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD3051E:101b-22: grva rnams dang ni sgo khyud du //
T02TD3051E:101b-23: rdo rje rin chen spras pa dang //
T02TD3051E:101b-24: de bzhin zla ba phyed pas brgyan //
T02TD3051E:101b-25: rdo rje'i phreng ba dang padma'i phreng ba bya'o //
T02TD3051E:101b-26: mtshan ma dgod pa yang rdo rje rgya gram gyi lte ba la rdo rje dril bu dgod par bya /
T02TD3051E:101b-27: shar gyi rdo rje'i rtsibs rtsa la ral gri bri /
T02TD3051E:101b-28: lho'i rdo rje'i rtsibs rtsa la seng ldeng gi phur bu /
T02TD3051E:101b-29: nub kyi rdo rje'i rtsibs rtsa la gnam lcags kyi tho ba /
T02TD3051E:101b-30: byad gi rdo rje'i rtsibs rtsal lcags kyu zhags pa dgod de /
T02TD3051E:101b-31: de dag ni nang gi phyag rgya dgod pa'o //
T02TD3051E:101b-32: 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu dgod pa ni /
T02TD3051E:101b-33: khro bo bcu'i phyag mtshan dgod de rgyud gzhan dang mthun /
T02TD3051E:101b-34: 'khor lo'i grva bzhir nang gi lha mo bzhi'i phyag mtshan dgod /
T02TD3051E:101b-35: lha snam gyi gzhir phyi yi lha mo bzhi'i phyag mtshan dgod /
T02TD3051E:101b-36: sgo bzhir sgo srung bzhi'i phyag mtshan dgad de rgyud gzhan dang mthun /
T02TD3051E:101b-37: dkar po ser po dmar po dang //
T02TD3051E:101b-38: de bzhin du ni ljang dang sngo //
T02TD3051E:101b-39: sngon po nang du shes bya ste //
T02TD3051E:101b-40: 'di ni tshon gyi rim pa yin //
T02TD3051E:101b-41: shar phyogs su ni dkar po che //
T02TD3051E:101b-42: lho phyogs su ni ser po che //
T02TD3051E:101b-43: byang ni ljang gu yang dag ldan //
T02TD3051E:101b-44: dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni //
T02TD3051E:101b-45: nag po mig sman bcag dang mtshungs //
T02TD3051E:101b-46: 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor bri zhing phyag rgya dgod pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD3051E:101b-47: de nas bum ba dgod de /
T02TD3051E:101b-48: gtso bo'i bum pa dbus su dgod /
T02TD3051E:101b-49: las kyi bum pa byang shar mtshams su gzhag ste /
T02TD3051E:102a-1: bgegs bsrung ba gyis shig ces brjod nas /
T02TD3051E:102a-3: bum pa gzhan rnams ni dang po lha gang bsgoms pa'i phyogs su gzhag go //
T02TD3051E:102a-4: de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga ni /
T02TD3051E:102a-5: sgrub pa'i thabs su rgyas par bshad pas 'dir ma bris so //
T02TD3051E:102a-6: de nas mchod pa'i rdzas ni /
T02TD3051E:102a-7: me tog snod ni brgya 'am stong ngam bcu'o //
T02TD3051E:102a-8: bdug spos dang mar me dang dri chab dang /
T02TD3051E:102a-10: stong ngam bcu las nyung du mi rung ngo //
T02TD3051E:102a-11: aargham dang zhal bsil dang rol mo'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs pa dung dang /
T02TD3051E:102a-19: rnga rings la sogs pa yang 'byor tshad do //
T02TD3051E:102a-25: sprin chen po la sogs pa yang bri'o //
T02TD3051E:102a-26: slob ma'i grangs dang bstun pa'i gtor ma du 'byor ba dang /
T02TD3051E:102a-27: gzhan yang lha rnams la 'bul ba'i tshogs kyi rdzas dang /
T02TD3051E:102a-29: ras zung dang bcas pa mchod rdzas 'byor tshad pa yang gzhag go //
T02TD3051E:102a-30: mchod pa'i rdzas kyi rim pa'o //
T02TD3051E:102a-31: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor cha rkyen thams cad phun sum tshogs pa shes nas ni /
T02TD3051E:102a-32: de nas rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gu rus khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i nga rgyal byas te /
T02TD3051E:102a-33: me tog gi phreng ba sngon po blangs te h'um bzhi'i sngags zlos shing rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor te /
T02TD3051E:102a-34: bltas la phreng ba de bcom ldan 'das la phul la /
T02TD3051E:102a-35: yang gar bya ba'i tshul gyis rang gi mgo la bcings nas phyag bya'o //
T02TD3051E:102a-36: rang lha'i rnal 'byor du 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD3051E:102a-37: dang por khro bo gnod mdzes kyis bgegs bsal ba'i sbyor ba sngon du byas nas bla ma mchod pa dang /
T02TD3051E:102a-39: ye shes kyi yan lag bsgoms nas /
T02TD3051E:102a-41: gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dang /
T02TD3051E:102a-42: dam tshig bskyed la ye shes sbyan drangs shing bstims la /
T02TD3051E:102a-43: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba yan chan byas la /
T02TD3051E:102a-44: gtor mas 'byung po thams cad tshim par byas la /
T02TD3051E:102a-45: de nas sgom pa sngon du 'gro bas slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3051E:102b-0: ye shes kyi dkyil @102b 'khor dang bsres nas bsang gtor dang mchod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba dang /
T02TD3051E:102b-1: ras zung thams cad dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD3051E:102b-3: de nas rang dbang blangs la /
T02TD3051E:102b-4: dkyil 'khor lha la dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T02TD3051E:102b-5: sems can don mdzod cig ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o ;
T02TD3051E:102b-7: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che //
T02TD3051E:102b-8: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD3051E:102b-9: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD3051E:102b-10: zhes rtse mo nas 'byung ba bzhin du gsol ba btab la dpal mchog dang bo nas 'byung ba'i glus nye bar bskul ba zhes bya ste /
T02TD3051E:102b-11: nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir//
T02TD3051E:102b-12: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / sems dpa'i rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02TD3051E:102b-13: rdo rje 'dzin par bdag sgrubs shig / dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD3051E:102b-14: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02TD3051E:102b-15: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag sgrubs shig / nyes pa med pa rtag pa ste //
T02TD3051E:102b-16: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes su chags //
T02TD3051E:102b-17: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02TD3051E:102b-18: bcom ldan de nyid bdag sgrubs shig / shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD3051E:102b-19: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD3051E:102b-20: byang chub sems su bdag sgrubs shig / dngos grub chen po mchog gi mchog / dbang phyug chen po rgyal bas rgyal //
T02TD3051E:102b-21: grub pa'i rdo rje che gsal ba //
T02TD3051E:102b-22: rdo rje snyems par bdag sgrubs shig / sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa //
T02TD3051E:102b-23: sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02TD3051E:102b-24: sems can kun gyi yab nyid de //
T02TD3051E:102b-25: 'dod chags mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog /
T02TD3051E:102b-26: bden pa gang gis ye shes mchog / shes rab thabs kyi dkyil 'khor yin //
T02TD3051E:102b-27: bden pa de yis mgon bdag la //
T02TD3051E:102b-28: khyed kyi 'dod ba rab rdzogs mdzad //
T02TD3051E:102b-29: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD3051E:102b-30: dag cing gsal la rnyog ba med //
T02TD3051E:102b-31: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD3051E:102b-32: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //
T02TD3051E:102b-33: de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes //
T02TD3051E:102b-35: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni //
T02TD3051E:102b-36: kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog / de nas bden pa bsgrag par bya ste /
T02TD3051E:102b-37: shes rab thabs dang dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD3051E:103b-1: lnga der bcug la slob ma'i mgo la bzhag la /
T02TD3051E:103b-2: aom ratna ku la mu dra aa bhi shinyts'a mi zhes brjod de dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ro //
T02TD3051E:103b-3: de nas rdo rje stong pa nyid las pam las aa mi de bar bskyed /
T02TD3051E:103b-4: bkug la mchod de gyur pa las rdo rjer byas la sbyin no //
T02TD3051E:103b-5: aom badzra sa ma ya aa bhi shinyts'a mi zhes bas lag tu sbyin no //
T02TD3051E:103b-6: de nas dril bu stong pa nyid las don yod grub par bskyed pa dang /
T02TD3051E:103b-7: bkug la mchod de slar dril bur byas la /
T02TD3051E:103b-8: lag pa g-yon par dril bu gtad la /
T02TD3051E:103b-9: aom aa dhi ba ti aa bhi shinyts'a mi zhes bdag po'i dbang sbyin no //
T02TD3051E:103b-10: de nas rdor dril gnyis slob ma'i mgor bsnol te bzhag nas /
T02TD3051E:103b-11: ming gi dbang rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin chos kyi rnam par snang ba'i bdag nyid sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD3051E:103b-12: aom badzra satva aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta zhes byin la kye dpal che ge mo zhes lha gang la me tog babs pa'i zhabs kyis mtshan pa'i ming gi dbang bskur ro //
T02TD3051E:103b-14: rdo rje slob dpon du dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD3051E:103b-15: bdag gzhan don ni rdzogs byed pa //
T02TD3051E:103b-16: rdo rje slob dpon dbang yin te //
T02TD3051E:103b-17: thugs rje'i bdag po stsal du gsol //
T02TD3051E:103b-18: zhes zhus pas de nas h'um las rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed la mchod de slar rdo rjer bskyed la /
T02TD3051E:103b-19: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD3051E:103b-20: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD3051E:103b-21: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD3051E:103b-22: rdo rje snyems tshul bdag nyid bdag / phyag na rdo rje'i skyes bu'o //
T02TD3051E:103b-23: zhes brjod nas rdo rje sbyin no //
T02TD3051E:103b-24: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD3051E:103b-25: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad//
T02TD3051E:103b-26: rtag par khyod kyis gzung ba yin //
T02TD3051E:103b-27: rgyal ba'i byang chub mchod par gyis //
T02TD3051E:103b-28: zhes dril bu g-yon par sbyin no //
T02TD3051E:103b-29: srid pa ngo bo nyid las dag / brjod la dkrol lo //
T02TD3051E:103b-30: de nas lhag par lha'i sku phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa sbyin te /
T02TD3051E:103b-31: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02TD3051E:103b-32: sdug bsngal chen po zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD3051E:103b-33: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02TD3051E:103b-34: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed //
T02TD3051E:103b-35: ces brjod la gzhal yas khang dang lha'i rnam par dag pa bstan te /
T02TD3051E:103b-37: de nas rjes gnang sbyin pa ni //
T02TD3051E:103b-38: 'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa //
T02TD3051E:104b-0: sems can kun la phan pa'i @104b phyir ;
T02TD3051E:104b-1: / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD3051E:104b-2: de bzhin du rdo rje'i 'khor lo dang /
T02TD3051E:104b-5: las kyi bar du bskur ro /
T02TD3051E:104b-6: de nas dngos grub kyi brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD3051E:104b-7: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD3051E:104b-8: phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug / rtag tu khyod kyis gzung bar gyis ;
T02TD3051E:104b-9: / phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD3051E:104b-10: de nas slob ma sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i skur bskyed la bla gos kyi mtha' ma lag pa g-yon pas bzung ba'i khu tshur snying gar bzung la /
T02TD3051E:104b-11: g-yas pa mchog sbyin du byas la /
T02TD3051E:104b-13: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang//
T02TD3051E:104b-14: 'phags pa rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu //
T02TD3051E:104b-15: rdo rje 'dzin par lung bstan gyis //
T02TD3051E:104b-16: shes rab kyi lung bstan sbyin no //
T02TD3051E:104b-17: de nas gsang ba'i ye shes bslab pa ni //
T02TD3051E:104b-18: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02TD3051E:104b-19: khams gsum na yang sdig med do //
T02TD3051E:104b-20: de bas 'dod chags bral bar bya //
T02TD3051E:104b-21: khyod ni nam yang ma byed cing //
T02TD3051E:104b-22: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02TD3051E:104b-23: phyin chad shi ba yod min te //
T02TD3051E:104b-24: sdug bsngal bsris pas mya ngan 'das //
T02TD3051E:104b-25: srid pa gtan du dngos grub 'gyur //
T02TD3051E:104b-26: rang bdag yongs su bor nas ni //
T02TD3051E:104b-27: dka' thub sbyad par mi bya ste //
T02TD3051E:104b-28: ji ltar bde bar bsgrubs nas ni //
T02TD3051E:104b-29: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ;
T02TD3051E:104b-30: / de ltar slob dpon dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD3051E:104b-31: sngags dang rgyud kyi phrin las can //
T02TD3051E:104b-32: sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems //
T02TD3051E:104b-33: snying rje'i dbang gis sems can don //
T02TD3051E:104b-34: khyed kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga dag / brtson par bri dang rgyud la ni //
T02TD3051E:104b-35: nyan dang bsgrub pa dag tu gyis //
T02TD3051E:104b-37: / dbang dag rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang /
T02TD3051E:104b-38: bla mal sgra sna tshogs dang /
T02TD3051E:104b-39: rol mo'i bye brag gis mchod nas bskor ba byas la /
T02TD3051E:104b-40: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rang gi snying gar bkod la /
T02TD3051E:104b-41: tshogs dang nang gi sbyin sreg gis tshim par bya'o //
T02TD3051E:104b-42: de nas yi ge brgya pa gdon //
T02TD3051E:104b-44: aom a'a: h'um mu: sa gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD3051E:104b-45: dkyil 'khor phyags la dman ma la sogs pa gtor ma dang rol mos chu po chen por dor ro //
T02TD3051E:104b-46: bdag gis dkyil 'khor cho ga legs spyar bas //
T02TD3051E:104b-47: bsgyur ba bsod nams gang thob pa //
T02TD3051E:105a-2: / dpal ldan gnas su 'gro bar shog / nor par gyur na mkhyen pa rnams la bzod par gsol /
T02TD3051E:105a-3: khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po lho phyogs dpal gyi ri la bzhugs pa'i bla ma mee tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD3051E:105a-5: // / pandi ta bal po de ba purna ma ti dang /
T02TD3051E:105a-6: bod kyi lo ts'a ba mgar chos kyi bzang pos bal po'i yul du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
